P010195.project_name: Toot Oil and Gas Development Project (02)

project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project, which would assist OGDC in the further development of the Toot oil field, thereby increasing domestic oil and gas production in the short term, consists of: (i) drilling of four additional development wells; (ii) production and field support facilities including separators and compressors; (iii) infrastructure including access roads, water supply systems and accommodation; and (iv) specialized oil field services and consultants.
